summary: This is a response letter from Equifax to the U.S. Attorney's Office dated September 16, 2019, regarding a request for credit records. Equifax states it has provided the entire credit file for the requested individual(s) but has not located any additional responsive information. The letter includes standard disclaimers about removed blank pages and consumer notices.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The recipient of the letter from Equifax, representing the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York.

events.title: Equifax Response to DOJ Records Request
events.description: Equifax sends a letter to the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York responding to a request for credit records, stating it has provided the entire credit file but no additional information.

locations: One St. Andrew's Pl, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Equifax responded to a records request from the U.S. Attorney's Office on September 16, 2019.
Equifax provided the entire credit file for the requested individual(s) but removed blank pages and automatic consumer notices.
Equifax stated it did not locate any additional information responsive to the request.
The request appears to be part of a federal investigation, as it came from the U.S. Attorney's Office in New York.
